name: Smashfield
description:
a small prototype about washing up in an unfamiliar place and battling for your life.

  • 3 unlockable weapons north of the starting area after defeating 5 waves
  • it's really hard to defeat 5 waves

code/art/sounds by @jay43K

[CONTROLS]

WASD/Arrows + Left Click Anywhere or

Gamepad (Xbox 360 controller tested)
